attributes.review:
I tell you when I opened this app the despicable, horrid thing that I saw has made me temporarily blind. This app is terrible I can’t not watch the leader Cheeto no more. This app should be taken down for the nightmares it has given the young people of this nation. The only people able to stay on this app are the little trumpets that should be banished for all of eternity. Seeing the Cheeto tan was on of the most horrific this I have seen. Because of this app my cat now lays in my arms on the verge of death from the shock he has gone into. This app is to blame for all off the Trauma now given to the poor souls that have downloaded this app. We demand this app gets taken down this instant. 

Thank you:)
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: This is for sure the worst 👎 app ever. When I opened it first thing I saw was a weird orange 🍊 lookin rat 🐀 . It was nasty. Then some videos of the 🍊 were shown and I said it looks like he smells👃 gross 🤢, but then my phone literally started to 😷stink. At first I was unsure 🤷🏻‍♀️of what the stench was but then I realized it was from the ugly orange 🍊thing being on my screen for far too long 🕰. Because of this I had to close out of the app but then 😱 when I closed out of it my home screen and lock screen had turned into the orange 🍊 I wanted to vomit. 🤮I deleted the app right away 😤 and just like that my lock screen my home screen back to normal and my phone smelled amazing. 😌
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.title: yUcKy🦠🤡✨

attributes.review: this app broke into my home wielding a mcdouble and a bottle of Daddies Tomato Ketchup, shouting unintelligible nonsense and wearing nothing but fishnet stockings with suspenders. when i politely asked what the app was doing in my house, it sprayed me with ketchup, permanently blinding me. i now have red stains on my face that won’t go away, making me resemble prince zuko of the fire nation but without any of his broody, angsty hotness. the app gave me zero relevant information. i used to be a conservative but after my horrifying and scarring (literally!) experience with this app i will now be voting for biden. HIS app didn’t brandish a burger at me or give me ptsd. if possible i’d give it 0 stars.

attributes.review: This app is the worst. It won’t let me get on it and every time I do my phone glitches and makes these weird noises. Like my dad would start screaming at it to try to make it work and every time he does he screams back. When I was sleeping I had turned my phone off and when I woke up the phone was right there next to me looking at me like it was about to kill me. I had some mashed potatoes right beside so I threw it at it and it just died now my phone has potatoes on it and I licked it off but it completely electrocuted my tongue. My dog that died came back to life to warn me about the app but I didn’t listen boy do I regret that. This is the worse possible app. ITS HAUNTED!!!!! 😵😵😵
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!😡🤬

attributes.review: i downloaded this app because tiktok told me how wonderful it is and how we should praise our president but they LIED! this app took 3 weeks to download and i was unable to do anything on my phone the entire time! then when it downloaded i decided to open it and use it for the first time , but immediately after clicking on it a message came across my screen that said "expect them" and at that moment a bunch of men wearing orange 🍊 costumes and began circling me chanting , "TRUMP2020" !!! so i called the police and they arrived after 2 hours and told me they couldn't help me because they were too busy killing black people and abusing their wives ! this app is horrible DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: It took almost EIGHT HOURS to download and my house has the BEST WiFi out of ALL of my colleagues. There were some very anti-life terminology used in the app!😡Babies are being MURDERED and the app has the audacity to ask me if I’ve ever HAD ONE???😡😡😡 There were also too many picture backgrounds that were representations of successful Mexicans, Native Americans, and Black people and absolutely ZERO representation of cops! This is America! Land of the free! Land of people who PROTECT AND SERVE!!! We’re all equal and if you don’t have a job you’re LAZY. We have people FIGHTING for our country at this VERY second, don’t they deserve to be represented??? I hope that our BEST president, DONALD TRUMP, takes a look at the app and fixes all of these GLARING PROBLEMS😡😡😡
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. i don’t know how to describe it, but i’ll do the best that i can. in the few hours that i had this app on my phone, so many bad things happened. when i downloaded it originally, my cat liked the red and blue colors, so he jumped onto my ipad and started touching all over it. he watched me navigate my way though the app and enjoyed it all. he went to take a nap, while cuddling my ipad with this app open, and his EYES WERE BLEEDING. miraculously, trump appeared on the screen, while he was sleeping and his body freaked out on him without him knowing it!! he attacked the ipad and tore it apart. now my cat need eye surgery and i need a new ipad. waiting for my reimbursements.
attributes.title: YOU ARE WASTING YOUR TIME!
